
Suite:,0,Testing the LoginPage as react

 When:,TheEmailIsSetTo: adam@email.com
 Then:,TheEmailIs: adam@email.com

 When:,ThePasswordIsSetTo: secret
 Then:,TheEmailIsNot: wade@rpc
